alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 3:01AM EST until November 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 5 inches along with a light glaze of ice. * WHERE...Rutland and Windsor Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow early this morning will mix with sleet and freezing rain at times through noon, with much of the area transitioning to plain rain thereafter. Precipitation will wind down quickly during the afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
